 1999-06291999-04-150,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by extending the resource tax credit to include the processing of natural gas, by changing the way the manufacturing and processing tax credit is calculated, and by making mining equipment eligible for the accelerated capital cost allowance.
